mapper.sql: id, task_id, waybill_no, discount_amount, derate_amount, is_calculated, calculate_time, write_time, remark
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.task_id, a.waybill_no, a.discount_amount, a.derate_amount, a.is_calculated, a.calculate_time, a.write_time, a.remark,b.create_time,b.customerid,b.service_type_code,b.adjust_service_type_code from fees_receive_dispatch_discount a inner join biz_dispatch_bill b on a.waybill_no=b.waybill_no where 1=1 and b.del_flag ='0' and a.is_calculated='0'
and a.task_id = #{taskId}

select id, task_id, subject_code, fees_no, waybill_no, unit_rate, unit_price, first_rate, first_price, continue_rate, continue_price, discount_amount, derate_amount, is_calculated, calculate_time, quote_id, write_time, remark from fees_receive_storage_discount where 1=1 and is_calculated='0'
and task_id = #{taskId}

select customer_id as customerId, subject_code as subjectCode, COUNT(0) as orderCount, sum(cost) as amount from fees_receive_storage where 1=1 and del_flag='0' and create_time>=#{startTime} and create_time<#{endTime} and customer_id=#{customerId} and subject_code=#{subjectCode} and is_calculated in ('1')
and tempreture_type in ('LD','LC')
GROUP BY customer_id,subject_code
